title: League hall

properties.name: description
properties.value: The League hall in a player-owned house is a room where the player can display various league achievements. This room can be created with 27 Construction and 15,000.

content:
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
League hall
Released6 January 2021 (Update)
Icon
Construction level27
Cost15,000
Door layout
League hall

The League hall in a player-owned house is a room where the player can display various league achievements. This room can be created with 27 Construction and 15,000.

There are 7 hotspots available:

  • Banner stand space
  • Rug space
  • Outfit stand space
  • Pedestal space x3
  • Accomplishment scroll space
  • Statue space
  • Trophy case space

Contents

  • 1 Banner stand
  • 2 Rug
  • 3 Outfit stand
  • 4 Pedestal (x3)
  • 5 Accomplishment scroll
  • 6 Statue
  • 7 Trophy case
  • 8 Changes

Date Changes
13 January 2021
(update)

Inconsistent flooring in Snowy-themed League Halls have been fixed.
